tags: this is one of those ideas that would not go away unless I wrote it down
summary: Pokéspe: The Potential for a Pokémon Cinematic Universe
title: Pokéspe: The Potential for a Pokémon Cinematic Universe
body:
You know, with ideas for a Pokémon Cinematic Universe currently in the works, and the fact that a title as little-known as Detective Pikachu got a live-action adaptation, I just realized…

PokéSpe would have been the perfect candidate to adapt for a PCU.

I mean, just think about it. It could all start with Red (the “Tony Stark” you could say) and we could see his growth across all the movies. Phase One could introduce the original Dex Holders, and all the subsequent Dex Holders can slowly be added on later. The longer chapters like GSC, RS, and DPP would naturally be split up into smaller film series. And it would all come together for the “Avengers”-type movies, like the Emerald chapter. 

Even cooler would be if child actors were cast for their premiere films, and we could watch them grow up alongside the movies Harry Potter-style. And while it may be too much to ask (not really), the actors would be cast based on their respective regions: the RGBYGSC Dex Holders would be Japanese actors, BW would be American, SM would be Hawaiian, etc.

Naturally, the movies would have to be PG-13 if you want to see decapitated arboks and actual loved ones getting killed.

If I had to list it all out, it would look something like this:

Phase #1

1) Pokémon: Red, Blue & Green (2019)

2) Pokémon: Gold & Silver (2019)

3) Pokémon: Yellow (2021)

4) Pokémon: Crystal (2022)

5) Pokémon Adventures (2023)

Phase #2

6) Pokémon: Ruby & Sapphire (2024)

7) Pokémon: FireRed and LeafGreen (2025)

8) Pokémon: Ruby & Sapphire 2 (2025)

9) Pokémon: Ruby and Sapphire 3 (2026)

10) Pokémon Adventures: Emerald (2027)

Phase #3

11) Pokémon: Diamond & Pearl (2028)

12) Pokémon: Black & White (2028)

13) Pokémon: Diamond & Pearl 2 (2029)

14) Pokémon: HeartGold & SoulSilver (2030)

15) Pokémon: Black & White 2 (2030)

16) Pokémon Adventures: Platinum (2031)

Phase #4

Pokémon: Black and White 3 (2032)

Pokémon: X & Y (2032)

Pokémon: Omega Ruby and Alpha Sapphire (2033)

Pokémon: Sun & Moon (2034)

Pokémon Adventures: Grey (2034)

…and so on and so forth.

blog.name: pokemonglobalnews
blog.title: Pokémon Global News
blog.description: The purpose is to inform people about Pokémon News for different countries around the world. Also try to help people with any doubt they have.

title: Detective Pikachu Greninja-GX Case File
body:
Release Date: April 05, 2019

It takes a sharp eye to keep track of Greninja-GX, but fortunately there’s an amazing Pokémon detective in town! Celebrate the POKÉMON Detective Pikachu movie with the Detective Pikachu Greninja-GX Case File, which includes a foil promo card and an oversize card featuring Greninja-GX—both of them prized elements of any Pokémon TCG collection. You’ll also get a cool Greninja pin, and you can tear into five Pokémon TCG: Detective Pikachu booster packs. The collection even includes two additional Pokémon TCG booster packs to expand to your collection, so you can uncover a few more Pokémon that might have been lurking in the shadows!


The Pokémon TCG: Detective Pikachu Greninja-GX Case File includes:

  • 1 foil promo card featuring Greninja-GX
  • 1 foil oversize card featuring Greninja-GX
  • 1 pin featuring Greninja
  • 5 Pokémon TCG: Detective Pikachu 4-card booster packs
  • 2 additional Pokémon TCG booster packs
  • 1 code card for the Pokémon Trading Card Game Online


The Detective Pikachu Greninja-GX Case File will be available April 5, 2019, in the Pokémon Center and where Pokémon TCG products are sold.

Source: https://www.pokemon.com/us/pokemon-tcg/product-gallery/detective-pikachu-greninja-gx-case-file/

title: Detective Pikachu Charizard-GX Case File
body:
Release Date: April 05, 2019


Time for some serious Pokémon sleuthing—because there’s an amazing Pokémon detective in town! Celebrate the POKÉMON Detective Pikachu movie with the Detective Pikachu Charizard-GX Case File, including a foil promo card and an oversize card featuring Charizard-GX—both of them prized elements of any Pokémon TCG collection. And that’s not all! You can tear into 4 special Pokémon TCG: Detective Pikachu booster packs, plus 2 additional Pokémon TCG booster packs to expand your collection—and to uncover a few more Pokémon from Ryme City and beyond!

The Pokémon TCG: Detective Pikachu Charizard-GX Case File includes:

  • 1 foil promo card featuring Charizard-GX
  • 1 foil oversize card featuring Charizard-GX
  • 4 Pokémon TCG: Detective Pikachu 4-card booster packs
  • 2 additional Pokémon TCG booster packs
  • 1 code card for the Pokémon Trading Card Game Online


The Detective Pikachu Charizard-GX Case File will be available April 5, 2019, in the Pokémon Center and where Pokémon TCG products are sold.

Source: https://www.pokemon.com/us/pokemon-tcg/product-gallery/detective-pikachu-charizard-gx-case-file/

blog.name: mandalawritersmart
blog.title: Reimagine!
blog.description: Promoting Positivity through your favorite characters!

title: The Secret of Grass (Type)
body:
Greninja:(raising his hand) I have a question.
Kirby:Yes, Greninja?
Greninja:(prideful)In the movie, can we have a fight scene between me and Ivysaur?
Kirby:(confused)Uh...
Ivysaur:For the last time, Greninja, I don’t want to fight you!
Greninja:But I have too! I need to know your secrets of your strengths! (Grabs Ivysaur) And you will tell me! What’s the secret?
Ash:(unamused)Maybe it’s the fact that he’s a grass type, and the water types are weak against it.
Greninja:(tapping his chin)Okay, that makes sense, but what about those two? (Points at Squirtle and Charizard)
Ivysaur:(not amused as well) What about them?
Greninja:So far, they’re the worst I ever fought.
Squirtle:(offended)Squirtle!
(Charizard roars in anger)
Greninja:Plus, you’re with them, so how is it you’re with a bunch of newbies?
Ivysaur:(annoyed)They are not newbies. Charizard is a fire type, which makes him weak against you, and Squirtle is just like you!
Greninja:Ah, but you didn’t take into account that I saw you fighting with the humans. You’ve been training illegally!
Ivysaur:(😡)That’s because this is Sm5sh, not Pokemon!
Kirby:(nervous)Okay, let’s move on!
(LOL. Just thought of this while playing sm5sh.)

dialogue.name: Greninja
dialogue.label: Greninja:
dialogue.phrase: (raising his hand) I have a question.

dialogue.name: Greninja
dialogue.label: Greninja:
dialogue.phrase: (prideful)In the movie, can we have a fight scene between me and Ivysaur?

dialogue.name: Ivysaur
dialogue.label: Ivysaur:
dialogue.phrase: For the last time, Greninja, I don’t want to fight you!

dialogue.name: Greninja
dialogue.label: Greninja:
dialogue.phrase: But I have too! I need to know your secrets of your strengths! (Grabs Ivysaur) And you will tell me! What’s the secret?

dialogue.name: Ash
dialogue.label: Ash:
dialogue.phrase: (unamused)Maybe it’s the fact that he’s a grass type, and the water types are weak against it.

dialogue.name: Greninja
dialogue.label: Greninja:
dialogue.phrase: (tapping his chin)Okay, that makes sense, but what about those two? (Points at Squirtle and Charizard)

dialogue.name: Ivysaur
dialogue.label: Ivysaur:
dialogue.phrase: (not amused as well) What about them?

dialogue.name: Greninja
dialogue.label: Greninja:
dialogue.phrase: So far, they’re the worst I ever fought.

dialogue.name: Greninja
dialogue.label: Greninja:
dialogue.phrase: Plus, you’re with them, so how is it you’re with a bunch of newbies?

dialogue.name: Ivysaur
dialogue.label: Ivysaur:
dialogue.phrase: (annoyed)They are not newbies. Charizard is a fire type, which makes him weak against you, and Squirtle is just like you!

dialogue.name: Greninja
dialogue.label: Greninja:
dialogue.phrase: Ah, but you didn’t take into account that I saw you fighting with the humans. You’ve been training illegally!

dialogue.name: Ivysaur
dialogue.label: Ivysaur:
dialogue.phrase: (😡)That’s because this is Sm5sh, not Pokemon!
(LOL. Just thought of this while playing sm5sh.)

summary: Detective Pikachu Walks into a Precinct
body:
Detective Pikachu Walks into a Precinct

A random officer bursts out of an interrogation room: “What is that? Is that a Pikachu?! Is he wearing a tiny hat?! IS THAT A PIKACHU WEARING A TINY HAT?!”

*punches a desk through a desk

“HES GOT A TINY HAT! YAGAGAWAGAGWAGAGA! HE’S GOT A TINY HAAAAAAT!”

After giving them highly classified documents in exchange for a hug and a photo, he returns home to his own pichu and gives it a tiny hat, and he can’t control his sobbing

summary: You know, maybe it was a smart move to have Detective Pikachu come out 2 weeks after Avengers Endgame. No doubt that movie’s...
body: You know, maybe it was a smart move to have Detective Pikachu come out 2 weeks after Avengers Endgame. No doubt that movie’s going to leave a lot of people really emotional and heartbroken coming out of it, so a lighthearted and fun movie about a talking Pikachu solving mysteries would probably be exactly the pick-me-up a lot of people are going to be needing around that time. It’ll make a killing on it’s opening weekend.

reblog.comment: You know, maybe it was a smart move to have Detective Pikachu come out 2 weeks after Avengers Endgame. No doubt that movie’s going to leave a lot of people really emotional and heartbroken coming out of it, so a lighthearted and fun movie about a talking Pikachu solving mysteries would probably be exactly the pick-me-up a lot of people are going to be needing around that time. It’ll make a killing on it’s opening weekend.

No doubt that movie’s going to leave a lot of people really emotional and heartbroken coming out of it, so a lighthearted and fun movie about a talking Pikachu solving mysteries would probably be exactly the pick-me-up a lot of people are going to be needing around that time. It’ll make a killing on it’s opening weekend.

summary: The Pokemon Company held a contest to let fans design a poster for the upcoming Detective Pikachu movie and these were the five...

The Pokemon Company held a contest to let fans design a poster for the upcoming Detective Pikachu movie and these were the five selected winners

Congratulations to the winning artists:

@sinagedesign from the UK

@iranzoduque from Spain

@rahuljonline from India

@gabrieledellotto_Tafuni from Italy

Tuck Yin Foong from Malaysia
